title: Auto-revert + local bisect on canary failures; emit fix work orders
goal: When canary fails, automatically revert the breaking change and run a local bisect to identify the culprit, then emit a fix work order.
steps: Implement revert automation based on the last merged commit range.
Implement git bisect automation integrated with the canary runner.
Emit a new WorkOrder with a minimal reproduction and required regression test.

rollback.strategy: Disable auto-revert and revert bisect automation scripts.
